summary: Landscape only version of fantasy cities and weapon with full town and city.
descriptionHtml:
Hi i have to work hard on this mod use creative and inspiration to make it so i hope you enjoy it.
This one was made by nifskope so it is very simple and i not is the expert of 3D draw lol.
If someone had already have my previous i sure they will know this is a landscape change mod and this is can call as the remake version of my old fantasy cities which make many people get problem with their home mod but don't worry this mod was remake to make sure that you can feel free when use it and don't get problem with your home mod (except it floating lol).
This mod add fantasy elements to the city which can be very huge and it is the remain of the thing came from " Forbiddent Scroll Crisis" from unknown time (*some of them were built by human).This mod not follow any story of Tamriel but it take you to other world. if you see a super high tower so don't worry about your house because you cannot pass border lol.
If someone want to find out where those "Forbiddent Scroll Crisis" come from you can visit Farengar at Dragonsearch and find the book by yourself (very easy) but it not said all because all thing around Skyrim have it own story just make sure you know the original of those strange thing.
This mod done recomend DLC version so you can use it when don't have DLC either.
I will release weapon only mod late and if someone want to use both landscape and weapon so visit my previous mod "Fantasy cities and weapons".
If there have any problem you can comment and i will try to fix it thank you for your visit.
author: congtuan999
